body: Hello, does Butterly works also with newer versions of OpenFOAM (I downloaded the 1706) or only with 1612? Can't manage to make work the example file 02_0_indoor_airflow. The installations were ok and I run Rhino, Oracle VM VirtualBox with default running, and OpenFOAM as administrator. But I get the error you can see from the creenshot. Thank you in advance. Francesco [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/IfeNwnO9e1us6uJR8rioFgZdjSBuBcwnnkX-fcJ0MaFNIUXbfacNSrPq7qI9VDgWr9VMf4vOnxAYYx*pUj9fVCo7rJvGnOs2/1.jpg)

replies.body:
As far as I know, only 1612

[https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/wiki/OpenFOAM-for-Window...](https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/wiki/OpenFOAM-for-Windows-Installation)

-Pin

Hello Pin, thank you for the information.



Francesco

Hi,  

take a look to this page:

[https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3A...](https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22OpenFOAM+installation+issues%22)

Ehsan

Hello Ehsa,

interesting, thank you. Anyway I installed the older version and it works.



Best,

Francesco
